long_description: Whether you're a commuter or a metropolitan day-tripper, this detailed map of the Denver area will show you the best routes to ride. Highlighted routes show primary, secondary and on-street bike paths. Detailed inset shows the downtown core; map margins provide rules of the road, safety precautions and other useful information. Double-sided map measures 34 x 22 in., and folds to 9 x 4 in. Scale: 1.125 in. equals one mile. Mapsco Maps; copyright 2008.
short_description: Whether you're a commuter or a metropolitan day-tripper, this detailed map of the Denver area will show you the best routes to ride.
